summary: The implementation covers most frontend requirements and backend product catalog functionality. However, there are several missing UI sections and features specified in the BuildRequest, including the Shop page, some static content sections (About, Blog detail pages, Contact), and certain interactive features. The backend is functional but minimal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each category card is clickable and navigates to category page
missing_requirements.reason: Category cards navigate to '/shop' but there is no evidence of category filtering on the shop page. The ShopPage.tsx file is not shown in the diff, and backend does not provide a method to filter products by category.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend can query and display all products
missing_requirements.reason: Backend only exposes getBestSellers() and getProduct(id) methods. There is no getAllProducts() method, though the frontend attempts to work around this by using getBestSellers() as a substitute for all products.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can update product quantities or remove items
missing_requirements.reason: The cart page displays items but does not provide UI controls to update quantities or remove individual items. Only a 'Clear Cart' button is implemented. The backend does not expose updateCartItem or removeCartItem methods.
Search icon is present in the header but has no implemented functionality (button has no onClick handler or navigation).
Account icon is present but has no implemented functionality (button has no onClick handler).
